name: Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy: Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The rich and compelling score in Sphinx, composed by Steve Duckworth in 2003, combines both Eastern and Western musical influences. Available in FLAC and MP3 formats.

  • Western orchestral sound with an Arabian feel.
  • Powerful melodies that draw the player deeper into the Egyptian fantasy world.
  • Includes 55 songs in raw, lossless FLAC format with Vorbis loop points, cover art and annotated with full metadata.
  • The extended version in high-bitrate MP3 features over two and a half hours of uninterrupted music.
  • Contains several previously unreleased tracks.

    Track list:


    01 — Abydos Council Interior (I)
    02 — Abydos Council Interior (II)
